alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 7:39PM CST until February 13 at 10:09AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27 feet, Agricultural land along the river is flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 27.2 feet and slowly rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 27.5 feet Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 27.2 Fri 7 pm CST 27.4 24.6 18.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
